data.text: @EnemyInAState I always kept my kids home when they are unwell. Even a before Covid. Which adult wants to go to work if they are not well? Why expect kids to it?.

@EnemyInAState We've reached such a point of division we now can't even agree to do what's right with regards to a deadly virus that continues to ravage the world and now a war is breaking out.But that's just human nature for the most part. Everyone for themselves when shit really hits the fan

@SDGovCrisis @EnemyInAState When I see people talking about unmasked public places it just reminds me that some people have actually had protections available to them these past 2 years that we never had in SD.
@EnemyInAState Parents in the US have been fighting for 2 years now. It's maddening. 😕

@EnemyInAState This is a natural consequence of the govt using the policy of permissive community transmission. These parents who drop off SARS2 positive kids at school arenâ€™t doing anything incongruent than what the govt encourages ppl to do. I strongly disagree with that policy/behavior btw.
